page.title: 12MY HORSE CHAMP
page.content: My name is Fiona Watson and I have a pet horse and his name is Champ.We ride him and groom him every day. Sometimes we even go to a show, but we don't show him we just go in for gymkana events and jumping. So far we have got twenty -five rossettes. My mum rides Champ and she has won two jumping rossettes. I have been in some jumping competitions on Champ; but I did not come anywhere .When we go home we feed him 'Molly Chaff' and 'Country Mix and we groom him again and get the sweat off then we let him out in the field. On school days we leave the stables at 9.00 p.m. At the stables there is a horse called Lucy and there is a girl in our class called Lucy. We keep our horse at Pear Tree Farm in Featherbed Lane. Champ is chestnut gelding with flaxind mane and tail. written by Fiona and Suzy.Aged 11.
